flawed_nl_solution:
25% of the apples are sour because 100 - 75 = <<100-75=30>>30
The average price of an apple sold is $.4 because 0.75(0.5) + 0.25(0.1)= 0.4
He got 100 apples because 40 / 0.4 = <<40/0.4=100>>100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 30. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
